channel.title: Finance on CookieHookey
channel.description: Recent content in Finance on CookieHookey

item.title: Online payment methods:V-Preca
item.description: In the previous article, “Payment methods in physical store”, we focused on physical stores, but this time we will consider online payment methods. For privacy reasons, virtual currency is a good choice, but it takes time and effort to obtain. In this article, I will focus on V-Preca Gift, which is more readily available. Unlike virtual currency, it cannot be used to pay restricted products because it is based on Visa payments.
